nguyen truong tin

In my opinion, a modern library in my hometown can provide a good environment for the local people to study and upgrade themselves. There are a lot of newspapers, magazines and reference books for their use. They can know what happened around the world and keep up with the fast- pace of today’s world. "Knowledge is strength". Knowledge can guide us to overcome problems we face in our daily life. To popularize the use of broadban
